decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Received 09/06/2014: L1141-2.3-01, L1141/2.1/02, L1141/2.1/03, L1141/2.1/04, Written Scheme of Investigation for an Archaeological Watching Brief (32681) May 2014, Archaeological Desk-Based Assessment (32640) April 2014, Arboricultural Advice note 18th February 2014, TPP1_AH, Acoustic Feasibility Report Rev 1.1 27th May 2014, Heritage Statement May 2014, Transport Assessment Volume 1 (140528/SK21411/TA01/VOL1) 28th May 2014, Transport Assessment Volume 2 (140528/SK21411/TA01/VOL2/APPX) 28th May 2014, Design & Access Statement May 2014, Preliminary Risk Assessment (27110 R01 (00)) May 2014, Statement of Community Involvement May 2014 and Received 30/06/2014: L1141/2.1/09-A and Received 21/08/2014: L1141/2.1/05-B, L1141/2.1/06-C, L1141/2.1/07-B, L1141/2.1/11, Covering Letter (LTR/L1141/5/DJL) 21st August 2014 and Received 02/09/2014: L1141/4.1/05 and Received 11/09/2014: L1141 Window and External Door Specification Revision A (11 September 2014)) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - Details in respect of the following shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority before the relevant work is begun:
 
A) Drawings at 1:5 with details of glazing bars at 1:1 of the proposed new windows.
B) Drawings at 1:10 of the proposed new internal doors.
C) Drawings at 1:10 of the proposed new entrance doors with details of glazing bars at 1:1.
The relevant work shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.
Condition : 4 - All works to existing windows shall be undertaken in accordance with the submitted Window and External Door Specification Revision A (11 September 2014).

Condition : 5 - All new external and internal works and finishes and works of making good to the retained fabric shall match the existing adjacent work with regard to method used and to colour textile and profile, unless shown otherwise on the drawings or other documentation hereby approved or required by condition attached to this consent.

Condition : 6 - No new plumbing, pipes, soil stacks, flues, vents grilles, security alarms or ductwork shall be fixed on the external faces of the building unless shown on the drawings hereby approved.
description: Conversion, remodelling and extension to provide teaching space in support of the expansion of the nearby St Paul's Primary School
